component.attributes:
&standard_uicomponent_attributes; &widget_var_attribute;
value false java.lang.Object
An org.primefaces.model.ScheduleModel instance representing the backed model.
locale false java.lang.Object Locale for localization, can be String or a java.util.Locale instance.
aspectRatio false java.lang.Float
Ratio of calendar width to height, higher the value shorter the height is.
view false java.lang.String month
The view type to use, possible values are 'month', 'agendaDay', 'agendaWeek', 'basicWeek', 'basicDay'.
initialDate false java.lang.Object
The initial date that is used when schedule loads. If ommitted, the schedule starts on the current date.
theme false java.lang.Boolean false
Enables/disables use of jQuery UI themes.
showWeekends false java.lang.Boolean true
Whether to include Saturday/Sunday columns in any of the views.
style false java.lang.String Style of the main container element of schedule.
styleClass false java.lang.String Style class of the main container element of schedule.
editable false java.lang.Boolean false
Defines whether calendar can be modified.
draggable false java.lang.Boolean true
When true, events are draggable.
resizable false java.lang.Boolean true
When true, events are resizable.
eventSelectListener false javax.el.MethodExpression void eventSelectListener(org.primefaces.event.ScheduleEntrySelectEvent) A server side listener to invoke when an event is selected.
dateSelectListener false javax.el.MethodExpression void dateSelectListener(org.primefaces.event.ScheduleDateSelectEvent) A server side listener to invoke when a date is selected.
eventMoveListener false javax.el.MethodExpression void eventMoveListener(org.primefaces.event.ScheduleEntryMoveEvent) A server side listener to invoke when an entry is moved.
eventResizeListener false javax.el.MethodExpression void eventResizeListener(org.primefaces.event.ScheduleEntryResizeEvent) A server side listener to invoke when an event is resized.
onEventSelectUpdate false java.lang.String Id(s) of components to update with ajax after an event is select, by default schedule event dialog is updated.
onDateSelectUpdate false java.lang.String Id(s) of components to update with ajax after an empty date is select, by default schedule event dialog is updated.
onEventMoveUpdate false java.lang.String Id(s) of components to update with ajax after an event is moved
onEventResizeUpdate false java.lang.String Id(s) of components to update with ajax after an event is resized
showHeader false java.lang.Boolean true Specifies visibility of header content.
leftHeaderTemplate false java.lang.String prev,next today Content of left side of header.
centerHeaderTemplate false java.lang.String title Content of header center.
rightHeaderTemplate false java.lang.String month,agendaWeek,agendaDay Content of right side of header.
allDaySlot false java.lang.Boolean true Determines if all-day slot will be displayed in agendaWeek or agendaDay views.
slotMinutes false java.lang.Integer 30 Interval in minutes in an hour to create a slot.
firstHour false java.lang.Integer 6 First hour to display in day view.
minTime false java.lang.String Minimum time to display in a day view.
maxTime false java.lang.String Maximum time to display in a day view.
startWeekday false java.lang.Integer 0 Specifies first day of week, by default it's 0 corresponding to sunday
